resources.string: A F1Tv/F1TvPro account is required to login

Sometimes this might happen even if your login and password are correct due a F1 API BUG.

 1. If that is the case a possible workaround is to go to F1TV website on your computer, then login on your account and logout then come back to the app and it will eventually work.
 2. It is also possible that for some reason your IP is blocked (401 response) in this case try to switch networks it might also work. In this case you have to reach F1 support as well.
Your session is expired, please login again
Something went wrong while trying to play this video
This content is not available in your region
No supported external player detected, please install a supported player such as VLC and try again, or disable the open with external player feature
You are watching the content with an external player
If ON after select a event you will be immediately redirected to the player in the general broadcast
Thumbnails may contain spoilers. Turning this OFF will disable thumbnail images
If ON we will use an external player to play content instead the built in player
Support the project by buying the developer a beer
Scan the QR code bellow with your phone, you will be redirected to the BuyMeACoffee page where you can donate
